description: This PHP source file manages the Web UI for configuring and adding a wireless network client via WPS (Wi-Fi Protected Setup). It includes server-side logic for detecting Wi-Fi radio status, WPS configuration, and client interaction scripts for enabling/disabling WPS, PIN validation, and user interface interactions.

methods.name: validChecksum
methods.description: Validates a WPS PIN checksum based on the number's format and checksum algorithm.

methods.name: set_config
methods.description: Sends AJAX requests to configure WPS settings such as enabling/disabling WPS, setting PIN, and pairing with a client.
